title: User Guide
subtitle: Learn how to use VerbadocPro Europa

step1.title: Upload documents
step1.description: Drag and drop your PDFs or images into the upload area

step2.title: Extract data
step2.description: Select the files and click 'Extract all'

step3.title: Review results
step3.description: Verify the extracted data in the Results section

step4.title: Export
step4.description: Export the data in Excel, JSON, or PDF format

extraction.title: Data Extraction
extraction.description: VerbadocPro uses AI to extract data from PDF and scanned documents.
features: Support for PDFs, images, and scanned documents

rag.title: RAG Library
rag.description: Upload documents and query their content using natural language.

review.title: Review and Validation
review.description: Review, edit, and validate extracted data before exporting.

chatbot.title: Chatbot Laia
chatbot.description: Virtual assistant that helps you with any questions about the platform.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: VerbadocPro supports PDF, JPG, PNG, and JSON. Scanned files are processed with OCR.
faq.q2: How many files can I process at once?
faq.a2: You can process up to 10 files simultaneously in batch.
faq.q3: How does the RAG Library work?
faq.a3: Upload documents to the library and query their content with natural language questions. The AI searches the content and generates contextualized answers.
faq.a4: Yes, you can ask questions by voice in the RAG Library and with the Chatbot Laia.
faq.a5: Yes, all data is stored securely with encryption and user-controlled access.
